title: WTB: 1887 N557 Little Rhody Cut Plug America/buchner morning glory maidens baseball

posts.post_title: WTB: 1887 N557 Little Rhody Cut Plug America/buchner morning glory maidens baseball
posts.post_content:

Thank you.
I would also take a look at the other sports in the n557 set if anyone happens to have any of those for sale.
Bump, anybody have one of these great cards?

Added pictures for reference. If you have either of these sitting around please pm me!
